text: My do togo darovali Pisaniye Muse, no [iudei] prerekalis' drug s drugom [po povodu tolkovaniya]... I yesli by ne bylo prezhde predopredeleniya Gospoda tvoyego, to ikh (t. ye. mekkanskikh mnogobozhnikov) spor byl by reshen. No oni, voistinu, - v somnenii i kolebanii naschet nego (t. ye. Korana)
